positioning.description:
Opposite Wall is a home decor and design studio based in Montreal, Canada, offering a wide range of artistic prints designed to reflect individual personalities. The brand emphasizes creativity and sustainability, producing unique, on-demand artworks that cater to diverse styles, from botanical to abstract and motivational. Opposite Wall aims to inspire daily life by providing a canvas for self-expression through home decor.
